dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6690 IH: To amend the Commodity Credit Corporation Charter Act to authorize the use of Commodity Credit Corporation funds for emergency assistance to dairy producers in the case of livestock relocation and feed crop losses due to natural disasters, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Valadao (for himself and Mr. Duarte) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Commodity Credit Corporation Charter Act to authorize the use of Commodity Credit Corporation funds for emergency assistance to dairy producers in the case of livestock relocation and feed crop losses due to natural disasters, and for other purposes.

section.header: Funding authority for livestock relocation and feed crop losses due to natural disasters
section.text: Section 5 of the Commodity Credit Corporation Charter Act (15 U.S.C. 714c) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by redesignating subsection (h) as subsection (i); and
by inserting after subsection (g) the following:

subsection.text: Provide emergency assistance to dairy and livestock producers for livestock relocation, shelter-in-place, and feed crop losses due to natural disasters.
